long_description: The compact Swiss-Tech Utili-Key 6-in-1 multitool packs 6 handy features into 1 small package-and it's the same size as a key! Each tool is precisely crafted from solid, professional-grade polished stainless steel. Tools include standard, Phillips and micro eyeglass screwdrivers, straight blade, serrated blade and a bottle opener. Swiss-Tech Utili-Key 6-in-1 multitool clips securely onto any key chain.
short_description: The compact Swiss-Tech Utili-Key 6-in-1 multitool packs 6 handy features into 1 small package-and it's the same size as a key!
